subject: Re: book on perl
body:
On Jul 2, 4:55 am, prabu.ayyap...@yahoo.com (Prabu Ayyappan) wrote:

>   There is some good stuffs in the below link.
>
> 

PLEASE do not do that!  Do not post the URL to a site which pirates
the copyrighted work of respected authors.  It's extremely rude.  If
you want to sample a book before you buy it, go to your local library.

Paul Lalli
